nodes.bodyText: It seems to me the KEY_CONNECTION_ID constant itself and the other remaining places where it is used can be removed as well. As far as I see it, the id was used in connection with the long removed Hono messaging component (?).

As I understood, KEY_CONNECTION_ID is being used by copyProperties(...) and getConnectionId(final ProtonConnection connection). And copyProperties(...) is in use in AmqpServiceBase and SimpleAuthenticationServer.
Yes, but the ID is only ever set in the attachments. Except for the copyProperties method, the ID is not read (see usage of getConnectionId). See also the long removed HonoMessaging class.
Good point. I have now removed the obsolete code regarding connection-id which is being set in AMQP connection attachments.
